file_manager module

class file_manager.FileManager[source]

Bases: object

A class to manage file operations for recordings, including creating the base directory and opening it for browsing.

BASE_DIR

The base directory path where recordings are stored.

Type:

str

BASE_DIR = 'C:\\STUDIA\\io-projekt\\io-projekt\\docs\\assets\\recordings'
browse_files()[source]

Opens the base directory in the system’s file explorer for browsing.
